Class FeedbackServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • servlets.FeedbackServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @WebServlet(value="/FeedbackServlet")
public class FeedbackServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    Servlet implementation class FeedbackServlet

    • Method Detail

      • createRouteFeedback

        private static java.lang.String createRouteFeedback(javax.persistence.EntityManager em,
                                                    int id,
                                                    java.util.List<Feedback> feedbackList,
                                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to create new feedback for a route
        Parameters:
        em - {EntityManager} - EntityManager manages database operations
        id - {Integer} - Id of route where feedback should be added
        feedbackList - {List} - List of feedback that should be created
        session - {HttpSession} - Needed to retrieve the user that creates the feedback
        Returns:
        {String} - "Success" if route feedback has been created successfully
        Throws:
        - - Exception if corresponding route is not found
        - - Exception if user has already given feedback for this route
        java.lang.Exception

        private static java.lang.String deleteRouteFeedback(javax.persistence.EntityManager em,
                                                    int id,

                                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to delete feedback of a route
        Parameters:
        em - {EntityManager} - EntityManager manages database operations
        id - {Integer} - Id of route where feedback should be deleted
        feedbackList - {List} - List of feedback that should be deleted
        session - {HttpSession} - Needed to retrieve the user that deletes the feedback
        Returns:
        {String} - "Success" if route feedback has been deleted successfully
        Throws:
        - - Exception if corresponding route doesn't exist
        - - Exception if logged in user != author of feedback
        java.lang.Exception

      • updateAvgRouteRating

        private static double updateAvgRouteRating(Route route)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Method to calculate the new average rating of a route as soon as anything has changed
        Parameters:
        route - {Route} - Route of which the average rating should be updated
        Returns:
        avgRating {Double} - Returns new average rating of the route
        Throws:
        - - Exception when a wrong number format is used
        java.lang.Exception
